SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_01.speaker: Priest
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_01.text: Can I count on you, Voyager?

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_140.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_140.text:
The steam plant has been completed,
boosting prosperity with its production.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_140.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_140.text:
The shipyard has been completed,
leading to increased trading power.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_140.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_140.text:
The station has been destroyed.
Trade in the Forestgale Alliance has plummeted.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_230.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_230.text:
The lumber mill has been completed,
increasing the efficiency of production.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_230.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_230.text:
The wind farm has been completed,
boosting prosperity with its production.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_230.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_230.text:
The port has been destroyed.
Trade in the Flamewave League plummeted.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_101.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_101.text:
The upgrades to the steam plant
increased its energy output.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_101.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_101.text:
The ironworks has been completed,
improving the munitions of the Flame Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_101.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_101.text:
The shipyard has been destroyed, ending
the production of new vessels and bringing
economic stagnation to the Wave Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_201.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_201.text:
The lumber mill upgrades have been completed,
allowing manpower to be diverted elsewhere.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_201.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_201.text:
The stables have been completed,
improving the cavalry of the Forest Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_201.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_201.text:
The wind farm has been destroyed, causing
energy production to plummet and the
economy of the Gale Tribe to stagnate.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_301.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_301.text:
The wind farm upgrades have been completed,
bringing an increase in energy production.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_301.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_301.text:
The barns at the farm have been completed,
making the Gale Tribe self-sufficient.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_301.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_301.text:
The lumber mill has been destroyed,
ending the production of new materials and
causing the economy of the Forest Tribe to stagnate.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_401.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_401.text:
The shipyard upgrades have been completed,
boosting the production of container ships.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_401.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_401.text:
The lighthouse has been completed,
making it possible for container ships
to reach their destinations safely.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_401.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_MISSIONOVER_CAMERA_401.text:
The steam power plant has been destroyed,
causing energy production to plummet and
the economy of the Flame Tribe to stagnate.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.text:
The Forest and Gale Temples
have both been destroyed.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.text:
The Wave and Flame Temples
have both been destroyed.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.text: The Flame Temple has been destroyed.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.text: The Forest Temple has been destroyed.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.text: The Gale Temple has been destroyed.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.speaker: UI
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_PHASEOVER_CAMERA_000_C.text: The Wave Temple has been destroyed.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
We cannot endure any further fighting.
We of the Forestgale Alliance surrender
to the Flamewave League, and beg you
to show us mercy.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: FirePriest
WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
From now on, you will adhere to the
teachings of wave and flame alone.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
We cannot endure any further fighting.
We of the Flamewave League surrender
to the Forestgale Alliance, and beg you
to show us mercy.

SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: WoodsPriest
WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_COMM_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
From now on, you will adhere to the
teachings of forest and gale alone.
